title: New: Kyson – Soul Person
content:
As if I haven’t ranted and raved enough about Australia recently, Adelaide by way of Berlin electronic producer Kyson gives me further reason to fall in love with Oz.

His recent release Blackstone is a coherent collection of majestic and soulful recordings, fusing ambient soundscapes with more contemporary influences and strikingly soft vocals. Highlight Soul Person toys with crescendoes and silences, reinvigorating the oft derisory chillwave tag to fantastical effect. Check it out below and grab the full release out now via Moodgadget Records.
